caption.p: Rhinacanthus nasutus ( Rn) and its beneficial properties regarding diabetes. Rn inhibits the production of Advanced glycation end-product (AGEs), prevents the increase in very low-density lipoprotein (VLDL) and low-density lipoprotein, and prevents the decrease in high density lipoprotein (HDL). Rn prevents reactive oxygen species (ROS) damage by activating superoxide dismutase (SOD) catalase and glutathione peroxidase (GPx). Rn also regulates peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor (PPARÎ±) and glucose transporter type 4 (GLUT-4).
